actions.name: ⨁  Clear YAML Blocks
actions.description: Scans the entire document and removes all YAML code blocks, including the ` ```yaml ` fences, markers, and their content.

actions.name: ⨁ Copy Next YAML Content
actions.description: Finds the first YAML block located **below** the cursor's current position and copies its content to the clipboard (excludes the fences).

actions.name: ⨁ Clear YAML Values
actions.description: Preserves the YAML structure (fences and keys) but deletes all values after the colons and list markers.

actions.name: ⨁ Copy Next YAML Values
actions.description: Finds the first YAML block below the cursor and copies **only** the values.
